imdb.plot outline: A cornucopia of flavors enter your mouth every time you take a bite. It is a Kaleidoscope on your tongue and on your palate! Welcome to the inaugural television episode of 'The Bon Vivant Gourmet!' A Food Aficionado - Yes! A Connoisseur of Cuisines - Okay! A Gastronomic Genius - Sure, why not? An Enthusiastic Epicurean with a Refined Palate and a Penchant for Perfect Plates - Almost! This is a comedic cooking show certain to tickle your taste buds!
imdb.title: Bon Vivant Gourmet
plot: A cornucopia of flavors enter your mouth every time you take a bite. It is a Kaleidoscope on your tongue and on your palate! Welcome to the inaugural television episode of 'The _Bon Vivant Gourmet_ (qv)!' A Food Aficionado - Yes! A Connoisseur of Cuisines - Okay! A Gastronomic Genius - Sure, why not? An Enthusiastic Epicurean with a Refined Palate and a Penchant for Perfect Plates - Almost! This is a comedic cooking show certain to tickle your taste buds!::Anonymous
